source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Advanced Prop Modeling - 3D Modeling in Blender

visible_instructors.title: Timothy Trankle
visible_instructors.name: Timothy
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Modeler, FX Artist, and Game Developer

items.headline: Learn advanced 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering with Blender and 3D-Coat by creating a 3D asset and final image.
objectives_summary: Use 3D modeling in Blender to create a prop model that can be used as a game asset or in video for your projects, games, movies, or clients.
Make amazing looking 3D models by using advanced techniques, tips, and tricks with the popular Blender and 3D-Coat software.
Save time and money by creating your own 3D models, quickly and efficiently.

items.title: Ultimate Blender guide: Make low poly characters in 3D!

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: 3D Model Military, Spartan & More Characters​! "I learned more in a half hour than I have in months on my own."
objectives_summary: Navigate Blender.
Create 5 3D models of different types of characters.
Put the art you make in this course into your portfolio.

items.title: Drawing for Storyboards
items.headline: Learn to draw for animation, storyboards, cartoon drawing, character design & story art
objectives_summary: Become a storyboard artist
Learn the ways of drawing boards for animation
Animation principles and design

items.title: The Emitter particle course for Blender 2.8 and above
items.headline: Get to know them and then fall in love.
objectives_summary: As a student you will learn everything from basic setup and placement of particles to advanced workflow where you use different types of particles, force and combined particle systems.

items.title: 3ds Max + Vray : 3d Visualizer handbook to Interior daylight

visible_instructors.title: Jamie Cardoso
visible_instructors.name: Jamie
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert in 3D Lighting, Rendering, 3ds Max, V-Ray, VR, PS

items.headline: 3d+3ds max + 3d Rendering + V-Ray+3d Lighting+Shading/Texturing + Photorealistic Interior + 3dsmax+ Vray+ Photoshop
objectives_summary: Learn Groundbreaking Techniques on how to Light an Interior Daylight Photo-Realistically with V-Ray & 3ds Max
Create Shaders Realistically
Texture Procedurally

items.title: 3d modelling - a Modo modeling guide
items.headline: Do you want to make your own 3d models in Modo? In this course you will learn to do so in just several hours!
objectives_summary: know the tools for creating 3d models in modo
know how snapping, falloffs, workplanes and action centers work
know the basic shortcuts for fast modeling

items.title: Videoscribe White Board Animation Masterclass 2020
items.headline: Create Your Own Whiteboard Animations with VideoScribe - No Animation Experience Needed!
objectives_summary: Create your own whiteboard animations from scratch with VideoScribe
Produce great eye-catching Whiteboard Animation videos that highlight your brand or product
Promote or Explain your Business, Product, or Service

items.title: Rigid Body Simulation Guide in Blender 2.8
items.headline: The Complete Guide to Using the Rigid Body Simulation in Blender 3D!
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will know all the settings in the rigid body simulation.
You will know how to use and create simulations using the Rigid Body in Blender.
You will learn all about the Rigid Body Constraints and how to use them efficiently.

items.title: Fusion 360 Product Concepts: Footwear
items.headline: Model a concept Footwear utilizing Fusion 360!
objectives_summary: In this course, students will dive straight into 3D product conceptualization of a Footwear. Subdivision modeling, surfacing and topology techniques will be significantly utilized throughout this course.

items.title: Sculpt a Rock Archway Ruin in Zbrush
items.headline: Project-Based Course for learning Zbrush Sculpting tools
objectives_summary: Basic Sculpting tools and Techniques

items.title: Introduction to Digital Sculpting in Sculptris

visible_instructors.title: Gary Groves
visible_instructors.name: Gary
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Skills Training and Game Development

items.headline: Create your own 3D models for animation, games and 3D printing
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to create 3D models using digital sculpting techniques and texture them for use in a game engine/3D rendering software.

items.title: Learn 3D Complete from Scratch in Blender Cinema 4D Unity C#
items.headline: Big 3D Class - Learn Cinema 4D Blender Unity C# from Scratch - This Class is  for all People who are interested in 3D
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling, Lighting, Texturing, Animating and more
Create Basic 3D Models in Cinema 4D
Render 3D Scenes in Cinema 4D

items.title: Comic Book Animation in After Effects

visible_instructors.title: Jonathan Lam
visible_instructors.name: Jonathan
visible_instructors.job_title: Marketing Artist | Concept Artist | Graphic Designer

items.headline: Start learning Adobe After Effects by creating a Comic Book Intro Animation in this quick and easy course.
objectives_summary: You will be able to use Adobe After Effects to a basic level
You will be able to transform your photos into a classic, comic book pop art-style cartoon
You will be able to create a flick book style animation

items.title: Space VFX

visible_instructors.title: Aidy Burrows
visible_instructors.name: Aidy
visible_instructors.job_title: Tutorial Co-Author With Gleb Alexandrov @ Creative Shrimp

visible_instructors.title: Gleb Alexandrov
visible_instructors.name: Gleb
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, Founder of the Creative Shrimp website

items.headline: The Ultimate Guide To Creating The Galaxy In Blender
objectives_summary: Create jaw-dropping space renders for your portfolio
Have a deep understanding of Blender's material nodes
Know how to create Planets, Asteroids, 360° SpaceScapes, Wormholes, BlackHoles and more.

items.title: Hard Surface 3D Modeling in Cinema 4D: Hyper Realistic Watch
items.headline: Cinema 4D Hyper Realistic Masterclass - Learn to Model, Texture and Render a Hyper Realistic 3D Rolex Watch in Cinema 4D
objectives_summary: Learn to create a high detailed 3D watch in Cinema 4D.
Understand the hard surface modeling pipeline in Cinema 4D.
Master hyper realistic 3D modeling and rendering in Cinema 4D.

items.title: Make a low poly Autumn Scene in Blender and Unity in 30 min!

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: Build models in Blender and import them to Unity. Learn how to make easy low poly models.
objectives_summary: Build simple models
Import them to Unity
